00028 size_t RangeState::encoded_length() {
00029   return 9 + Serialization::encoded_length_string(transfer_log);
00030 }

00034 void RangeState::encode(uint8_t **bufPtr) {
00035   *(*bufPtr)++ = state;
00036   Serialization::encode_long(bufPtr, soft_limit);
00037   Serialization::encode_string(bufPtr, transfer_log);
00038 }
00039 
00040 
00041 
00042 bool RangeState::decode(uint8_t **bufPtr, size_t *remainingPtr) {
00043   uint8_t bval;
00044   if (!Serialization::decode_byte(bufPtr, remainingPtr, &bval))
00045     return false;
00046   state = bval;
00047   if (!Serialization::decode_long(bufPtr, remainingPtr, &soft_limit))
00048     return false;
00049   if (!Serialization::decode_string(bufPtr, remainingPtr, &transfer_log))
00050     return false;
00051   return true;
00052 }
